about_the_game:
Step into a world divided by the enigmatic Spheres, where different races live under strict balance – a balance that has never been questioned… until now.

As the protagonist, an ordinary young person from a remote village, you receive an unexpected invitation to a grand ball. What seems like a stroke of fate soon turns into a revelation of hidden anomalies, ancient powers, and a secret that could shatter reality itself.

But you are not alone.

Meet intriguing characters from various races, each carrying their own secrets, struggles, and desires. Will they become your allies, rivals, or something more? Your choices will shape their destinies – and your own.

Key Features:

✨ Deep, branching narrative – Unravel the mysteries of the world and shape your fate through meaningful choices.

💖 Romance and relationships – Build deep bonds, develop friendships, or ignite rivalries.

🎭 Intrigue and mystery – Every conversation and action holds a piece of the puzzle.

🛍️ Customization – Choose your gender and outfit.

🎼 Atmospheric soundtrack – Let the music immerse you in the emotions of each moment.

⚖️ Multiple endings – Will you restore balance, break the system, or reshape the world entirely?

🎮 Mini-games – Engage in exciting mini-games that offer additional challenges and help unveil hidden aspects of the characters and the world.

Volume 1 Launch:

Begin your journey with Volume 1 – available now! Stay tuned for regular updates that will expand the narrative, introduce new characters, mini-games, and reveal deeper secrets of the Spheres.

The boundaries of reality are fragile. What lies beyond them?

Only you can decide.
